name: Apricot Jam Bars
author: DREVILFROG
summary: Delicious, simple jam bars are made with a bit of almond flour for a nutty flavour and rustic texture.
ingredients: 1 ¼ cups apricot jam, or as needed
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line an 8x8-inch baking dish with parchment paper
Beat butter and caster sugar together in a bowl until smooth; beat in egg, almond extract, and vanilla extract
Whisk flour, almond flour, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl
Stir flour mixture into butter mixture until a smooth dough forms
Press 1/2 of the dough into the prepared baking dish
Spread apricot jam evenly over the dough
Drop remaining dough in small spoonfuls evenly over the jam
Bake in the preheated oven until golden, about 25 minutes
Allow to cool before cutting into squares and serving
